column4: Hi, I sometimes get a bunch of error bells in a row while I'm not doing anything. I (thought) I'd disabled error bells already, how can I determine the source program causing the bells and/or how can I turn them off for good?
a common thing would be internal devices like bluetooth stopping/starting I used to get this on an old laptop
look at the syslog and see if there are any obvious warnings
nothing that looks like it matches the times I heard the bells
